summary: An ordinance ratifying and confirming loan in sum of $600,000 and authorizing issuance and sale of general etc. bonds for providing funds for improvement of Railroad Avenue from Madison Street to Bay Street by constructing a seawall and fillints, etc., as submitted to electors under Ordinance No. 62112; providing for levy and collection of taxes for payment of principal and interest of said bonds, and creating and establishing a construction fund and a bond interest and redemption fund.
